item.title: Contacts
item.description: Hassina Bilheux - Instrument ScientistExpertise: HFIR and SNS imaging beam lines <div class="expand-label" style="cursor: pointer;" onclick="$h = $(this);$h.next('div').slideToggle(100,function () {$h.children('i').attr('class',function () {return $h.next('div').is(':visible') ? 'fa fa-chevron-down' : 'fa fa-chevron-right';});});"> <i style="font-size:x-small;" class="fa fa-chevron-right"></i> <span> Short Bio ... </span> </div> <div class="expand-content" style="display: none;"> Dr. Hassina Bilheux obtained her Ph.D. in Physics at the Univ. of Versailles, France.

item.title: Github Repositories
item.description: Our gloal is to only develop open source tools. You will find here a list of the major repositories hosting our programs jupyter notebooks used in the analysis of the data python_notebooks python library used for normalization neunorm Imaging Resonance python library imagingReso iBeatles for Bragg Edge fitting iBeatles set of jupyter widgets ipywe Root analysis library RootPlantProcessing
